item.description:
Please join the New England Sitecore User Group to hear a special presentation from Sitecore's CTO, John West. We are thrilled at the opportunity to hear Mr. West talk about himself, his personal and technical background, and describe his experiences and challenges while writing his recently published book Professional Sitecore Development.

 

Join us for networking and hors d'oeuvres followed by an "Up Close and Personal" presentation by John, and a question and answer session. The event will be held in the Empire Room (7th Fl) at the Westin Copley Hotel.
item.name: "Professional Sitecore Development" Book Tour
